title: Publication or advertising of ordinances, amendments,
context: ยง46-2 Publication or advertising of ordinances, amendments, resolutions, and bills. Notwithstanding any other provisions of law to the contrary, whenever any law requires the publication or advertisement of ordinances, amendments, resolutions, or bills, the publication or advertisement shall be in a newspaper of general circulation within the county concerned, and need not be in a daily newspaper. [L 1963, c 71, ยง1; Supp, ยง138-51; HRS ยง46-2] Case Notes Voluntary county decision to place advertising in papers other than plaintiff&rsquo;s during strike, not enjoinable. 272 F. Supp. 175.
